playlist_url: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=YOUR_PLAYLIST_ID (The URL of the YouTube playlist that you want to download.)
output: downloads (The directory where the downloaded videos will be saved.)
start: 1(int) (The index of the first video to download.)
end: 0(int) (The index of the last video to download.)
output_format: mp4 (The format of the downloaded videos
mode: both (The mode of the downloader (audio, video, or both).)
retries: 3(int) (The number of retries in case of download failure.)
